title: The Kraken's Keep
starting_description: You've stumbled upon a sunken pirate ship, rumored to hold the legendary Kraken's Eye jewel. Three ancient locks guard the treasure chest. Solve their riddles to claim your prize!

paths.description: The first lock is a weathered wooden box with a number wheel. A faded inscription reads: 'The depth of the deepest trench holds the answer.'
paths.hint: The Mariana Trench is the deepest point in the ocean and its depth starts at 7. //  Press the button of the sea's fury.
paths.death_text: The wooden box splinters under the pressure of your wrong guess. Saltwater floods the chamber, and the treasure is lost to the depths.

paths.description: A complex mechanism with a picture wheel and a distance sensor guards the second lock.  A nearby inscription warns: 'Only those who have the patience of the deep will calm the siren's call.'
paths.hint: The compass shows the way. // Keep it close to find the treasure.
paths.death_text: The siren's song becomes a deafening roar! The mechanism collapses, crushing the chest and all its riches.

paths.description: The final lock is a pressure-sensitive plate with colored buttons.  A warning is engraved: 'Shake the beast before calming its rage.'
paths.hint: The Kraken's mighty tentacles are strong and need to be calmed with a shake. // Then press the color of the sun as it sets.
paths.death_text: The Kraken awakens in a fit of rage! Its powerful grip crushes the chest, leaving only scattered debris.
